alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 128 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Lake George, or 31 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodland Park and Divide. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
